Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win | CPU: AMD Ry 7 4800 | GPU: NVID RTX 3060 | RAM: 16gb

 

i only have 3 auto save files that cycle around (#29, 30 & 31) these have been my only save files since July 8th (they just overwrite themselves). this happens in all my campaigns (3 auto S cycle) . i even started a new game and after auto save 3 it rewrote auto save 1 (i added this Auto 3 jsn file in the "other" Attch) 

i cant open/find any other Auto save (no json files) *in main game, and all auto save are out of order auto 2 is on 4/4 and auto 1 is 4/11, Auto 2 has a meta but 1 dose not. 5 and 3 have the save time stamp for png. and i see that i have 2 png save for #22

the photo i have added is a file grouping,  top 3 are first 3 rows of game file, on bottom left and middle are auto saves in name order in folder and green square on right is folder newest from game.

 

Included Attachments:

autosave_2.meta

autosave_3.json
